mapper.insert: insert into book (title, writer, writedate, province, city, startdate) values(#{title}, #{writer}, now(), #{province}, #{city}, #{startdate})
mapper.select: select bookno, title, writer, writedate, province, city, startdate from book where bookno = #{bookno}
select bookno, title, writer, writedate, province, city, startdate from book where writer = #{email} order by writedate
